submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfPermutations(self, n: int, requirements: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        requirements.sort()
        MOD=10**9+7
        mxend=mxcnt=0
        for end,cnt in requirements:
            mxend=max(mxend,end)
            mxcnt=max(mxcnt,cnt)
        dp=[[0]*(mxcnt+1) for _ in range(mxend+1)]
        dp[0][0]=1
        i=0
        # print(requirements,mxend,mxcnt)
        for end,cnt in requirements:
            # print('req',end,cnt)
            while i<end:
                s=0
                for j in range(cnt+1):
                    s=(s+dp[i][j])%MOD
                    dp[i+1][j]=s
                    if j>i:
                        s=(s-dp[i][j-i-1])%MOD
                i+=1
            for j in range(cnt):
                dp[i][j]=0
        # for row in dp:
        #     print(row)
        return dp[mxend][mxcnt]
